backend/main.mo: Defines an empty Motoko actor with no methods.
feature_evidence.json: Lists feature evidence entries mapping features to related frontend files and tests.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Contains prewritten one‑sentence summaries for various frontend source files.
frontend/index.css: Defines Tailwind base styles and Valentine-themed OKLCH color variables for light and dark modes.
frontend/index.html: Basic HTML entry point loading the React app via main.tsx.
frontend/README.md: Explains the three‑page flow and how to add the finale image asset.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Controls navigation between question, celebration, and finale pages using local state.
frontend/src/components/FireworksBackgro: Canvas component that runs the fireworks animation hook as a fixed background overlay.
Page layout wrapper adding themed background, gradient overlay, and footer attribution.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor tied to Internet Identity, refetching on identity changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useFireworksAnimation: Implements canvas-based fireworks with rockets, explosions, particles, and continuous animation.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides authentication context using Internet Identity with login, clear, and identity persistence.
frontend/src/hooks/useMovingNoButton.ts: Provides a hook that animates a button to move smoothly within a container and jump to new random positions on click or timed intervals.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines Tailwind base styles and extensive Valentine-themed CSS variables and utility classes.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with QueryClient and InternetIdentity providers and loads App.
frontend/src/pages/CelebrationPage.tsx: Shows a 5‑second celebration screen with animated hearts and fireworks before triggering onComplete.
frontend/src/pages/FinalePage.tsx: Displays a finale image with fallback text and Valentine styling over a fireworks background.
frontend/src/pages/QuestionPage.tsx: Renders the main question with a Yes button and a moving No button controlled by useMovingNoButton.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind theme extensions including Valentine colors, fonts, and plugins.
project_state.json: Stores project metadata, requirements, and notes for the Valentine-themed multi-page app.
